attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

We kindly ask you to spare few moment to address the crisis of Somalia and the support the current interim government desperate needs in order to bring peace, security and good governance back to Somalia.

For so long the British government has turned a blind eye on the crisis of Somalia, we thus say enough is enough and it's either now or never that your government should stand with the victims of women & children in Somalia.

I agree the above statement and I consider myself to be a friend of Somalia.

Kind regards

Junayd Egale
Chairman of ASPAC
